title.narrative: IA PG2 Senegal Eye Health project

description.narrative: The overall goal of the project is to consolidate the gains of the previous projects and improve access to eye health in underserved areas in the spirit of universal access to eye health.

participating-org.narrative: Ireland - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
Ministry of Health and Social Welfare - Senegal

receiver-org.narrative: La Direction de la Lutte contre la Maladie - MSAS
La Direction de la Lutte contre la Maladie - MSAS
